name: pnap
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing PhoenixNAP BMC resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`pnap` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/phoenixnap/terraform-provider-pnap).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing PhoenixNAP BMC resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/phoenixnap/terraform-provider-pnap)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-pnap` repo](https://github.com/phoenixnap/pulumi-pnap/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-pnap` repo](https://github.com/phoenixnap/terraform-provider-pnap/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/phoenixnap/terraform-provider-pnap)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-pnap` repo](https://github.com/phoenixnap/pulumi-pnap/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-pnap` repo](https://github.com/phoenixnap/terraform-provider-pnap/issues).

tagAssignment.description: Tag request to assign to the IP Block.

createdBy.description: Who the tag was created by.

id.description: The unique id of the tag.

isBillingTag.description: Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices.

name.description: The name of the tag.

value.description: The value of the tag assigned to the IP Block.

ips.description: List of public IPs associated to the resource.
List of public IPs associated to the resource.

publicNetworkIpBlock.description: The assigned IP Block to the public network.

ips.description: List of public IPs associated to the resource.

certificates.description: Define the custom SSL certificates to be used instead of defaults. The `certificates` block has 3 fields.

clusterDomain.description: This maps to rancher's cluster-domain. Cluster Domain.

etcdSnapshotRetention.description: This maps to rancher's etcd-snapshot-retention. Number of snapshots to retain. Default value is 5.

etcdSnapshotScheduleCron.description: This maps to rancher's etcd-snapshot-schedule-cron. Snapshot interval time in cron spec.

nodeTaint.description: This maps to rancher's node-taint. Registering kubelet with set of taints.

tlsSan.description: This maps to rancher's tls-san. Add additional hostname or IP as a Subject Alternative Name in the TLS cert.

token.description: Shared secret used to join a server or agent to a cluster.

caCertificate.description: The SSL CA certificate to be used for rancher admin.

certificate.description: The SSL certificate to be used for rancher admin.

certificateKey.description: The SSL certificate key to be used for rancher admin.

password.description: This is the password to be used to login to the Rancher Server. This field is returned only as a response to the create cluster request. Make sure to take note or you will not be able to access the server.

username.description: The username to use to login to the Rancher Server. This field is returned only as a response to the create cluster request. Make sure to take note or you will not be able to access the server.

name.description: The name of the workload cluster. This field is autogenerated if not provided.

nodeCount.description: Number of configured nodes. Currently only node counts of 1 and 3 are possible.

nodes.description: The nodes associated with this node pool.

serverType.description: Node server type. Cannot be changed once the cluster is created. Default value is "s0.d1.small". For a full list of allowed values visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/rancher/1)

sshConfig.description: Configuration defining which public SSH keys are pre-installed as authorized on the server. The `ssh_config` block has 3 fields.

installDefaultKeys.description: Define whether public keys marked as default should be installed on this node. Default value is true.

keyIds.description: List of public SSH key identifiers.

location.description: Workload cluster location. Cannot be changed once the cluster is created. For a full list of allowed locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/rancher/1)

name.description: The name of the workload cluster. This field is autogenerated if not provided.

serverCount.description: Number of configured servers. Currently only server counts of 1 and 3 are possible. Default value is 1.

serverType.description: Node server type. Cannot be changed once the cluster is created. Default value is "s0.d1.small". For a full list of allowed values visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/rancher/1)

userData.description:
User data for the [cloud-init](https://cloudinit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) configuration in base64 encoding. NoCloud format is supported. Follow the [instructions](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/bmc-cloud-init) on how to provision a server using cloud-init. Only ubuntu/bionic and ubuntu/focal and ubuntu/jammy are supported.


The `netris_softgate` block has three fields:

hostOs.description: Host OS on which the Netris Softgate is installed.

netrisUserPassword.description: Auto-generated password set for user 'netris' in the web console.

netrisWebConsoleUrl.description: The URL for the Netris Controller web console.

controllerAddress.description: IP address or hostname through which to reach the Netris Controller.

controllerAuthKey.description:
The authentication key of the Netris Controller to connect to. Required for the softgate agent to be able to interact with the Netris Controller.


The `tags` block has field `tag_assignment`.
The `tag_assignment` block has 2 fields:

controllerVersion.description: The version of the Netris Controller to connect to.

hostOs.description: Host OS on which the Netris Softgate is installed.

gatewayAddress.description: The address of the gateway assigned / to assign to the server. When used as part of request body, it has to match one of the IP addresses used in the existing assigned private networks for the relevant location. Deprecated in favour of a common gateway address across all networks available under `network_configuration`.

configurationType.description: Determines the approach for configuring IP blocks for the server being provisioned. If `PURCHASE_NEW` is selected, the smallest supported range, depending on the operating system, is allocated to the server. The following values are allowed: `PURCHASE_NEW`, `USER_DEFINED`, `NONE`. Default value is `PURCHASE_NEW`.

ipBlocks.description:
Used to specify the previously purchased IP blocks to assign to this server upon provisioning. Used alongside the `USER_DEFINED` configurationType. Must contain at most 1 item.

The `ip_blocks` block has field `server_ip_block`.
The `server_ip_block` block has 2 fields:

vlanId.description:
The VLAN on which this IP block has been configured within the network switch.

The `public_network_configuration` is the fourth field of the `network_configuration` block.
The `public_network_configuration` block has field `public_networks`:

The `public_networks` block has field `server_public_network`.
The `server_public_network` block has 2 fields:

configurationType.description: Determines the approach for configuring IP blocks for the server being provisioned. If `PURCHASE_NEW` is selected, the smallest supported range, depending on the operating system, is allocated to the server. The following values are allowed: `PURCHASE_NEW`, `USER_DEFINED`, `NONE`. Default value is `PURCHASE_NEW`.

gatewayAddress.description: The address of the gateway assigned / to assign to the server. When used as part of request body, it has to match one of the IP addresses used in the existing assigned private networks for the relevant location. Deprecated in favour of a common gateway address across all networks available under `network_configuration`.

privateNetworks.description:
The list of private networks this server is member of. When this field is part of request body, it'll be used to specify the private networks to assign to this server upon provisioning. Used alongside the `USER_DEFINED` configuration type.

The `private_networks` block has field `server_private_network`.
The `server_private_network` block has 3 fields:

dhcp.description:
Determines whether DHCP is enabled for this server. Should be false if ips is not an empty list. Not supported for proxmox OS. Default value is `false`.

The `ip_blocks_configuration` is the third field of the `network_configuration` block.
The `ip_blocks_configuration` block has 2 fields:

ips.description:
IPs to configure on the server. IPs must be within the network's range. Must contain at least 1 item.


The `storage_configuration` block has field `root_partition`.
The `root_partition` block has two fields:

IPs to configure on the server. IPs must be within the network's range. Must contain at least 1 item.


The `storage_configuration` block has field `root_partition`.
The `root_partition` block has two fields:

raid.description: Software RAID configuration. The following RAID options are available: `NO_RAID`, `RAID_0`, `RAID_1`.

size.description: The size of the root partition in GB. `-1` to use all available space.

createdBy.description: Who the tag was created by.

isBillingTag.description: Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices.

name.description: The name of the tag.

value.description:
The value of the tag assigned to the IP Block.


The `network_configuration` block has 4 fields: `gateway_address`, `private_network_configuration`, `ip_blocks_configuration` and `public_network_configuration`.

volume.description: Volume to be created alongside storage.

capacityInGb.description: Capacity of volume in GB. Currently only whole numbers and multiples of 1000 GB are supported.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this volume was created.

deleteRequestedOn.description: Date and time of the initial request for volume deletion.

id.description: The unique id of the tag.

name.description: The name of the tag.

path.description: Volume's full path. It is in form of `/{volumeId}/pathSuffix`.

status.description: Volume's status.

tags.description: Tags to set to the volume.

usedCapacityInGb.description: Used capacity in GB, updated periodically.

nfs.description: NFS specific permissions on the volume.

tagAssignment.description: Tag to set to the volume.

createdBy.description: Who the tag was created by.

id.description: The unique id of the tag.

isBillingTag.description: Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices.

name.description: The name of the tag.

value.description: The value of the tag assigned to the volume.

The value of the tag assigned to the resource.
* `created_by ` - The tag's creator.

name.description: Event name.

timestamp.description: The UTC time the event initiated.

userInfos.description: Details related to the user / application.

clientId.description: The client ID of the application.

username.description: The logged in user or owner of the client application.

limit.description: The limit of the number of results returned. The number of records returned may be smaller than the limit.

offset.description: The number of items to skip in the results.

dueDate.description: Date and time when the invoice payment is due.

id.description: The unique resource identifier of the invoice.

number.description: A user-friendly reference number assigned to the invoice.

sentOn.description: Date and time when the invoice was sent.

status.description: Payment status of the invoice. The following values are allowed: `PAID`, `UNPAID`, `OVERDUE`, `PAYMENT_PROCESSING`

locationAvailabilityDetails.description: Infos about location, solutions and availability for a product.

productCategory.description: Product category. Currently only `SERVER` category is supported.

productCode.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

availableQuantity.description: Total available quantity of product in specific location. Max value is 10.

minQuantityAvailable.description: Is product available in specific location for requested quantity.

solutions.description: Solutions supported in specific location for a product.

plans.description: The pricing plans available for this product.

coresPerCpu.description: The number of physical cores present on each CPU.

correlatedProductCode.description: Product code of the correlated product.

priceUnit.description: The unit to which the price applies.

sku.description: The SKU identifying the pricing plan.

reason.description: The reason for changing the limit.

provider.description:
The provider type for the pnap package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

assignedResourceId.description:
ID of the resource assigned to the IP Block.
* `assigned_resource_type `- Type of the resource assigned to the IP Block.

cidr.description: The IP Block in CIDR notation.

cidrBlockSize.description: CIDR IP Block Size. Currently this field should be set to either `/31`, `/30`, `/29` or `/28`. For a larger Block Size contact support.

createdOn.description: Date and time when the IP Block was created.

isBringYourOwn.description: True if the IP Block is a "bring your own" block.

location.description: IP Block location ID. Currently this field should be set to `PHX`, `ASH`, `SGP`, `NLD`, `CHI`, `SEA` or `AUS`.

status.description: The status of the IP Block.

tags.description: Tags to set to IP Block, if any.

tags.description: Tags to set to IP Block, if any.

cidr.description: IP range associated with this private network in CIDR notation. Setting the `force` query parameter to `true` allows you to skip assigning a specific IP range to network.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this private network was created.

description.description: The description of this private network.

force.description: Query parameter controlling advanced features availability. It is advised to use with caution since it might lead to unhealthy setups.

location.description: The location of this private network. Supported values are `PHX`, `ASH`, `SGP`, `NLD`, `CHI`, `SEA` and `AUS`.

locationDefault.description:
Identifies network as the default private network for the specified location. Default value is `false`.
* `vlan_id `- The VLAN that will be assigned to this network.

memberships.description: A list of resources that are members of this private network.

name.description: The friendly name of this private network. This name should be unique.

status.description: The status of the private network.

type.description:
The type of the private network.
* `servers ` - (Deprecated) List of server details linked to the private network.

configuration.description: Rancher configuration parameters. The `configuration` block has 7 fields.

initialClusterVersion.description: The Rancher version that was installed on the cluster during the first creation process.

location.description: Workload cluster location. Cannot be changed once the cluster is created. For a full list of allowed locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/rancher/1)

metadatas.description: Connection parameters to use to connect to the Rancher Server Administrative GUI.

name.description: The name of the workload cluster. This field is autogenerated if not provided.

nodePools.description: The node pools associated with the cluster (must contain exactly one item). The `node_pools` block has 4 fields.

workloadConfiguration.description: Workload cluster configuration parameters. The `workload_configuration` block has 4 fields.

location.description: Workload cluster location. Cannot be changed once the cluster is created. For a full list of allowed locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/rancher/1)

nodePools.description: The node pools associated with the cluster (must contain exactly one item). The `node_pools` block has 4 fields.

workloadConfiguration.description: Workload cluster configuration parameters. The `workload_configuration` block has 4 fields.

name.description: The name of the workload cluster. This field is autogenerated if not provided.

assignedResourceId.description: The resource ID currently being assigned to reservation.

autoRenew.description: A flag indicating whether the reservation will auto-renew (default is true, it can only be modified after the creation of resource).

endDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation ends.

initialInvoiceModel.description: Reservations created with initial invoice model ON_CREATION will be invoiced on same date when reservation is created. Reservation created with CALENDAR_MONTH initial invoice model will be invoiced at the begining of next month.

lastRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation was renewed last.

location.description: The location code.

nextRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation will be renewed if auto renew is set to true.

priceUnit.description: The unit to which the price applies.

productCode.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

sku.description: The SKU code of product pricing plan.

startDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation starts.

autoRenew.description: A flag indicating whether the reservation will auto-renew (default is true, it can only be modified after the creation of resource).

sku.description: The SKU code of product pricing plan.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Reservation resources.

assignedResourceId.description: The resource ID currently being assigned to reservation.

autoRenew.description: A flag indicating whether the reservation will auto-renew (default is true, it can only be modified after the creation of resource).

endDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation ends.

initialInvoiceModel.description: Reservations created with initial invoice model ON_CREATION will be invoiced on same date when reservation is created. Reservation created with CALENDAR_MONTH initial invoice model will be invoiced at the begining of next month.

lastRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation was renewed last.

location.description: The location code.

nextRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation will be renewed if auto renew is set to true.

priceUnit.description: The unit to which the price applies.

productCode.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

sku.description: The SKU code of product pricing plan.

startDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation starts.

action.description: Action to perform on server. Allowed actions are: reboot, reset (deprecated), powered-on, powered-off, shutdown.

cloudInit.description: Cloud-init configuration details. Structure is documented below.

clusterId.description: The cluster reference id if any.

coresPerCpu.description: The number of physical cores present on each CPU.

cpu.description: A description of the machine CPU.

cpuCount.description: The number of CPUs available in the system.

force.description:
Query parameter controlling advanced features availability. Currently applicable for networking. It is advised to use with caution since it might lead to unhealthy setups.


The `cloud_init` block has one field:

installOsToRam.description: If true, OS will be installed to and booted from the server's RAM. On restart RAM OS will be lost and the server will not be reachable unless a custom bootable OS has been deployed. Only supported for ubuntu/focal. Default value is `false`.

location.description: Server Location ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created (e.g., PHX). For a full list of available locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1)

managementAccessAllowedIps.description: Define list of IPs allowed to access the Management UI. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, Management UI is disabled.Must contain at least 1 item.

managementUiUrl.description: The URL of the management UI which will only be returned in response to provisioning a server.

netrisControllers.description: Netris Controller configuration properties. Knowledge base article to help you can be found [here](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/netris-bare-metal-cloud#deploy-netris-controller).

netrisSoftgate.description: Netris Softgate configuration properties. Follow [instructions](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/netris-bare-metal-cloud#deploy-netris-softgate) for retrieving the required details. Structure is documented below.

networkConfiguration.description: Entire network details of bare metal server. Structure is documented below.

networkType.description: The type of network configuration for this server. Currently this field should be set to PUBLIC_AND_PRIVATE, PRIVATE_ONLY, PUBLIC_ONLY or USER_DEFINED. Setting the force query parameter to `true` allows you to configure network configuration type as NONE.

os.description: The servers OS ID used when the server was created (e.g., ubuntu/bionic, centos/centos7). For a full list of available operating systems visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1).

password.description: Password set for user Admin on Windows server which will only be returned in response to provisioning a server.

pricingModel.description: Server pricing model. Currently this field should be set to HOURLY, ONE_MONTH_RESERVATION, TWELVE_MONTHS_RESERVATION, TWENTY_FOUR_MONTHS_RESERVATION or THIRTY_SIX_MONTHS_RESERVATION.

privateIpAddresses.description: Private IP Addresses assigned to server. Must contain at least 1 item.

provisionedOn.description: Date and time when server was provisioned.

publicIpAddresses.description: Public IP Addresses assigned to server. Must contain at least 1 item.

ram.description: A description of the machine RAM.

rdpAllowedIps.description: List of IPs allowed for RDP access to Windows OS. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, RDP is disabled. To allow RDP access from any IP use 0.0.0.0/0. Must contain at least 1 item.

rootPassword.description: Password set for user root on an ESXi server which will only be returned in response to provisioning a server.

sshKeyIds.description: A list of SSH key IDs that will be installed on the server in addition to any SSH keys specified in this request.

sshKeys.description: A list of SSH Keys that will be installed on the server.

status.description: The status of the server.

storage.description: A description of the machine storage.

storageConfiguration.description: Storage configuration. Structure is documented below.

supersededBy.description: Unique identifier of the server to which the reservation has been transferred.

supersedes.description: Unique identifier of the server from which the reservation has been transferred.

tags.description: Tags to set to server, if any. Structure is documented below.

type.description: Server type ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created (e.g., s1.c1.small, s1.c1.medium). For a full list of available types visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1).

action.description: Action to perform on server. Allowed actions are: reboot, reset (deprecated), powered-on, powered-off, shutdown.

cloudInit.description: Cloud-init configuration details. Structure is documented below.

force.description:
Query parameter controlling advanced features availability. Currently applicable for networking. It is advised to use with caution since it might lead to unhealthy setups.


The `cloud_init` block has one field:

installOsToRam.description: If true, OS will be installed to and booted from the server's RAM. On restart RAM OS will be lost and the server will not be reachable unless a custom bootable OS has been deployed. Only supported for ubuntu/focal. Default value is `false`.

location.description: Server Location ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created (e.g., PHX). For a full list of available locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1)

managementAccessAllowedIps.description: Define list of IPs allowed to access the Management UI. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, Management UI is disabled.Must contain at least 1 item.

netrisSoftgate.description: Netris Softgate configuration properties. Follow [instructions](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/netris-bare-metal-cloud#deploy-netris-softgate) for retrieving the required details. Structure is documented below.

networkConfiguration.description: Entire network details of bare metal server. Structure is documented below.

networkType.description: The type of network configuration for this server. Currently this field should be set to PUBLIC_AND_PRIVATE, PRIVATE_ONLY, PUBLIC_ONLY or USER_DEFINED. Setting the force query parameter to `true` allows you to configure network configuration type as NONE.

os.description: The servers OS ID used when the server was created (e.g., ubuntu/bionic, centos/centos7). For a full list of available operating systems visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1).

pricingModel.description: Server pricing model. Currently this field should be set to HOURLY, ONE_MONTH_RESERVATION, TWELVE_MONTHS_RESERVATION, TWENTY_FOUR_MONTHS_RESERVATION or THIRTY_SIX_MONTHS_RESERVATION.

rdpAllowedIps.description: List of IPs allowed for RDP access to Windows OS. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, RDP is disabled. To allow RDP access from any IP use 0.0.0.0/0. Must contain at least 1 item.

sshKeyIds.description: A list of SSH key IDs that will be installed on the server in addition to any SSH keys specified in this request.

sshKeys.description: A list of SSH Keys that will be installed on the server.

storageConfiguration.description: Storage configuration. Structure is documented below.

tags.description: Tags to set to server, if any. Structure is documented below.

type.description: Server type ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created (e.g., s1.c1.small, s1.c1.medium). For a full list of available types visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1).

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Server resources.

action.description: Action to perform on server. Allowed actions are: reboot, reset (deprecated), powered-on, powered-off, shutdown.

cloudInit.description: Cloud-init configuration details. Structure is documented below.

clusterId.description: The cluster reference id if any.

coresPerCpu.description: The number of physical cores present on each CPU.

cpu.description: A description of the machine CPU.

cpuCount.description: The number of CPUs available in the system.

force.description:
Query parameter controlling advanced features availability. Currently applicable for networking. It is advised to use with caution since it might lead to unhealthy setups.


The `cloud_init` block has one field:

installOsToRam.description: If true, OS will be installed to and booted from the server's RAM. On restart RAM OS will be lost and the server will not be reachable unless a custom bootable OS has been deployed. Only supported for ubuntu/focal. Default value is `false`.

location.description: Server Location ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created (e.g., PHX). For a full list of available locations visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1)

managementAccessAllowedIps.description: Define list of IPs allowed to access the Management UI. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, Management UI is disabled.Must contain at least 1 item.

managementUiUrl.description: The URL of the management UI which will only be returned in response to provisioning a server.

netrisControllers.description: Netris Controller configuration properties. Knowledge base article to help you can be found [here](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/netris-bare-metal-cloud#deploy-netris-controller).

netrisSoftgate.description: Netris Softgate configuration properties. Follow [instructions](https://phoenixnap.com/kb/netris-bare-metal-cloud#deploy-netris-softgate) for retrieving the required details. Structure is documented below.

networkConfiguration.description: Entire network details of bare metal server. Structure is documented below.

networkType.description: The type of network configuration for this server. Currently this field should be set to PUBLIC_AND_PRIVATE, PRIVATE_ONLY, PUBLIC_ONLY or USER_DEFINED. Setting the force query parameter to `true` allows you to configure network configuration type as NONE.

os.description: The servers OS ID used when the server was created (e.g., ubuntu/bionic, centos/centos7). For a full list of available operating systems visit [API docs](https://developers.phoenixnap.com/docs/bmc/1).

publicIpAddresses.description: Public IP Addresses assigned to server. Must contain at least 1 item.

ram.description: A description of the machine RAM.

rdpAllowedIps.description: List of IPs allowed for RDP access to Windows OS. Supported in single IP, CIDR and range format. When undefined, RDP is disabled. To allow RDP access from any IP use 0.0.0.0/0. Must contain at least 1 item.

rootPassword.description: Password set for user root on an ESXi server which will only be returned in response to provisioning a server.

sshKeyIds.description: A list of SSH key IDs that will be installed on the server in addition to any SSH keys specified in this request.

supersededBy.description: Unique identifier of the server to which the reservation has been transferred.

supersedes.description: Unique identifier of the server from which the reservation has been transferred.

pnap:index/sshKey:SshKey.description:
Provides a phoenixNAP SSH key resource. This can be used to create,
modify, and delete SSH keys.

default.description: Keys marked as default are always included on server creation and reset unless toggled off in creation/reset request.

fingerprint.description:
SSH key auto-generated SHA-256 fingerprint.
* `createdOn `- Date and time of creation.
* `lastUpdatedOn ` - Date and time of last update.

name.description: Friendly SSH key name to represent an SSH key.

default.description: Keys marked as default are always included on server creation and reset unless toggled off in creation/reset request.

name.description: Friendly SSH key name to represent an SSH key.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SshKey resources.

default.description: Keys marked as default are always included on server creation and reset unless toggled off in creation/reset request.

fingerprint.description:
SSH key auto-generated SHA-256 fingerprint.
* `createdOn `- Date and time of creation.
* `lastUpdatedOn ` - Date and time of last update.

name.description: Friendly SSH key name to represent an SSH key.

clientVlan.description: Custom Client VLAN that the Storage Network will be set to.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this volume was created.

deleteRequestedOn.description: Date and time of the initial request for volume deletion.

location.description: The location of this storage network. Currently this field should be set to `PHX` or `ASH`.

name.description: The name of the tag.

status.description: Volume's status.

volumes.description: Volumes to be created alongside storage. Currently only 1 volume is supported (must contain exactly one item).

deleteRequestedOn.description: Date and time of the initial request for volume deletion.

name.description: The name of the tag.

status.description: Volume's status.

volumes.description: Volumes to be created alongside storage. Currently only 1 volume is supported (must contain exactly one item).

isBillingTag.description: Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices.

name.description: The unique name of the tag.

values.description: The optional values of the tag..

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getEvents.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getEvents.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getInvoices.

limit.description: The limit of the number of results returned. The number of records returned may be smaller than the limit.

number.description: A user-friendly reference number assigned to the invoice.

offset.description: The number of items to skip in the results.

sentOnFrom.description: Minimum value to filter invoices by sent on date.

sentOnTo.description: Maximum value to filter invoices by sent on date.

sortDirection.description: Sort given field depending on the desired direction. The following values are allowed: `ASC`, `DESC`.

sortField.description: If a sort field is requested, pagination will be done after sorting. The following values are allowed: `number`, `sentOn`, `dueDate`, `amount`, `outstandingAmount`.

status.description: Payment status of the invoice. The following values are allowed: `PAID`, `UNPAID`, `OVERDUE`, `PAYMENT_PROCESSING`

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getInvoices.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

limit.description: Maximum number of items in the page (actual returned length can be less).

number.description: A user-friendly reference number assigned to the invoice.

offset.description: The number of returned items skipped.

status.description: The status of the invoice.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getIpBlock.

cidr.description: The IP Block in CIDR notation.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getIpBlock.

assignedResourceId.description:
ID of the resource assigned to the IP Block.
* `assigned_resource_type `- Type of the resource assigned to the IP Block.

cidr.description: The IP Block in CIDR notation.

createdOn.description: Date and time when the IP Block was created.

id.description: The unique id of the tag.

isBringYourOwn.description: True if the IP Block is a "bring your own" block.

location.description: IP Block location ID.

status.description: The status of the IP Block.

tags.description: The tags assigned to the IP Block.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getLocations.

location.description: The location code. Currently the following values are allowed: `PHX`, `ASH`, `NLD`, `SGP`, `CHI`, `SEA` and `AUS`.

productCategory.description: The product category. Currently the following values are allowed: `SERVER`, `BANDWIDTH`, `OPERATING_SYSTEM`, `PUBLIC_IP` and `STORAGE`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getLocations.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

location.description: The location code.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPrivateNetwork.

name.description: The friendly name of this private network.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPrivateNetwork.

cidr.description:
IP range associated with this private network in CIDR notation.
* `vlan_id `- The VLAN of this private network.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this private network was created.

description.description: The description of this private network.

location.description: The location of this private network.

locationDefault.description: Identifies network as the default private network for the specified location. Default value is `false`.

memberships.description: A list of resources that are members of this private network.

name.description: The friendly name of this private network.

status.description: The status of the private network.

type.description:
The type of the private network.
* `servers ` - (Deprecated) List of servers' details linked to the private network.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getProductAvailability.

locations.description: The location code. Currently the following values are allowed: `PHX`, `ASH`, `NLD`, `SGP`, `CHI`, `SEA` and `AUS`.

minQuantity.description: Minimal quantity of product needed. Minimum, maximum and default values might differ for different products. For servers, they are 1, 10 and 1 respectively.

productCategories.description: Product category. Currently only `SERVER` category is supported.

productCodes.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

showOnlyMinQuantityAvailable.description: Show only locations where product with requested quantity is available or all locations where product is offered. Default value is `true`.

solutions.description: Currently only the following value is allowed: `SERVER_RANCHER`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getProductAvailability.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getProducts.

location.description: The location code. Currently the following values are allowed: `PHX`, `ASH`, `NLD`, `SGP`, `CHI`, `SEA`, `AUS` and `GLOBAL`.

productCode.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getProducts.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

location.description: The code identifying the location.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPublicNetwork.

name.description: The friendly name of this public network.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPublicNetwork.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this public network was created.

description.description: The description of this public network.

ipBlocks.description: A list of IP Blocks that are associated with this public network.

location.description: The location of this public network.

memberships.description: A list of resources that are members of this public network.

name.description: The friendly name of this public network.

status.description: The status of the public network.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getQuota.

name.description: The name of the Quota.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getQuota.

limit.description: The new limit that is requested.

name.description: The name of the Quota.

quotaEditLimitRequestDetails.description: List of requests to change the limit on a Quota.

status.description: The status of the Quota.

used.description: The Quota used expressed as a number.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getRancherCluster.

name.description: Cluster name.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getRancherCluster.

initialClusterVersion.description: The Rancher version that was installed on the cluster during the first creation process.

location.description: Deployment location.

metadatas.description: Connection parameters to use to connect to the Rancher Server Administrative GUI.

name.description: The name of the node pool.

nodePools.description: The node pools associated with the cluster.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getReservation.

sku.description: The SKU code of product pricing plan.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getReservation.

assignedResourceId.description: The resource ID currently being assigned to reservation.

autoRenew.description: A flag indicating whether the reservation will auto-renew (default is true, it can only be modified after the creation of resource).

endDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation ends.

initialInvoiceModel.description: Reservations created with initial invoice model ON_CREATION will be invoiced on same date when reservation is created. Reservation created with CALENDAR_MONTH initial invoice model will be invoiced at the begining of next month.

lastRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation was renewed last.

location.description: The location code.

nextRenewalDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation will be renewed if auto renew is set to true.

priceUnit.description: The unit to which the price applies.

productCode.description: The code identifying the product. This code has significance across all locations.

sku.description: The SKU applied to this reservation.

startDateTime.description: The point in time (in UTC) when the reservation starts.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getServer.

id.description: The unique identifier of the server.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getServer.

location.description: Server Location ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created.

networkConfigurations.description: Entire network details of bare metal server.

networkType.description: The type of network configuration for this server.

os.description: The servers OS ID used when the server was created.

privateIpAddresses.description: Private IP Addresses assigned to server. Must contain at least 1 item.

publicIpAddresses.description: Public IP Addresses assigned to server. Must contain at least 1 item.

status.description: The status of the server.

supersededBy.description: Unique identifier of the server to which the reservation has been transferred.

supersedes.description: Unique identifier of the server from which the reservation has been transferred.

tags.description: The tags assigned to the server.

type.description: Server type ID. Cannot be changed once a server is created.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSshKey.

id.description: The unique identifier of the SSH Key.

name.description: Friendly SSH key name to represent an SSH key.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSshKey.

default.description: Keys marked as default are always included on server creation and reset unless toggled off in creation/reset request.

id.description: The unique identifier of the SSH Key.

name.description: Friendly SSH key name to represent an SSH key.

name.description: The friendly name of this storage network.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getStorageNetwork.

createdOn.description: Date and time when this volume was created.

deleteRequestedOn.description: Date and time of the initial request for volume deletion.

id.description: The unique id of the tag.

location.description:
The location of this storage network.
* `network_id `- ID of network the storage belongs to.

name.description: The name of the tag.

status.description: Volume's status.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getTag.

id.description: The unique identifier of the tag.

name.description: The unique name of the tag.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getTag.

description.description:
The description of the tag.
* `is_billing_tag `- Whether or not to show the tag as part of billing and invoices.
* `resource_assignments ` - The tag's assigned resources.

name.description: The name of the tag.
